Transmogrified to:
Visage of the First Eidolon

effects.display_string: Set: While you have one or more Bone Shield charges, the damage you take is reduced by 2.0%. Losing a Bone Shield charge has a chance to reduce the damage you take by an additional 1.0%, up to 3.0% for 6 sec.
Set: Your damage is increased by 0.5% per active Bone Shield charge. Taking damage while below 6 Bone Shield charges has a chance to generate 1-2 Bone Shield charges.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 66,880 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Use: Inject an enemy with digestive venom, dealing 782,701 Nature damage over 20 sec. While active, your attacks and abilities against the target restore 40,766 health. Cannot occur more than every 1 sec. 

Overhealing from this effect permanently increases your maximum health by the same amount, becoming an absorb shield upon leaving combat. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 60,230 Nature damage over 8 sec.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
